title: Riot Please Ban this Player (IGN: FullPwnage Server: OCE)
body:
SO i was having a really bad game, like really bad i fed like 2/9 on vanye and we lost all lanes, this trynd starts raging and stuff, after game he adds me and starts sending death threats. I dont give a shit about this kind of thing but a lot of people do and i dont want this sort of toxicity in the league. I would like to see some action on riots part to stop him. Please can i get a red poster on this thread. I already reported him but since this happened after that i thought i'd post it here.
> * 1.

replies.body: Why is your desktop so clean? D: new PC?

It's his Nanas PC.

He only gets to play on school holidays.

> [{quoted}](name=TouchMyKimchi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RodAReUl,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2014-12-27T08:07:14.897+0000)
>
> It's his Nanas PC.
> 
> He only gets to play on school holidays.

Silly me, just saw the Norton.

wow. assholes, but like. its hard, they will just make a new account. and if you mark their IP address they can just proxy it or whatever, and besides. other people could be using said IP to access league who aren't assholes. its just like the schoolyard. hard to police well. but totally with you man.
hes like 1 v 1 me hahahaha mad baits
What does that mean and how would i do that?
My entire post above is a link, clicking should take you there.

Idiot.
Provokes him and runs to Rito for halp.

How old are you?
You should be banned as well kid.
naming and shaming...plz ban this guy.
